Summary: During newcast after Redskins night game in background saw several lights crossing near monument
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter watching the end of Redskin night game I was watching the weather forecast on same channel. In the background I saw several lights crossing the sky first 3-5 then 5-7 then ten or so all going in a straight line and going from right to left on the television screen. The were all losing altitude as if descending. From right to left starting at 2 oclock going to 8 oclock. I could not make out the shape of the objects. The Washington mounument was in the background. These could have been airplanes but there were just too many of them. It could also be some sort of reflection caused by cameras??? I have it saved on my DVR. If you go back to newscast at 10 or so minutes earlier it shows planes landing in background of camera?? you guys can look at video and decide. I emailed newsroom and got no response. Call my cell during day if you have any questions. At almost 12pm it was too many of them to be airplanes I think.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around December 8th 2008
